Comment: Trump keeps calling Fed Chair Jerome Powell a “fool” and wants lower interest rates, even though the Fed is supposed to stay free from politics. Experts say if a president bends the Fed to short-term goals, it can lead to higher inflation and boom-and-bust cycles that hurt everyone.
